Package ca.phon.app.project

Class DesktopProject

java.lang.Object
ca.phon.project.LocalProject
ca.phon.app.project.DesktopProject
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExtendable, Project, ProjectRefresh
public class DesktopProject
extends LocalProject
Local project which will send files to trash instead of deleting them during corpus/session removal.
